benchmark_details.name: LegalBench-RAG
benchmark_details.overview: LegalBench-RAG is the first benchmark specifically designed to evaluate the retrieval step of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines within the legal space, focusing on extracting minimal, highly relevant text segments from legal documents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a robust framework for assessing retrieval precision and recall in legal RAG systems.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Queries are answered by exactly one document, and the benchmark does not assess structured numerical data parsing or multi-document reasoning.

data.source: Derived from four unique legal datasets including PrivacyQA, CUAD, MAUD, and ContractNLI.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are computed based on the accuracy of retrieval for each query.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision indicates more relevant documents retrieved, while higher recall indicates more documents retrieved overall.
methodology.validation: Validated through rigorous manual inspection of each query and its corresponding annotations.
